thread.title: Marine in Iraq Drops Truth BOMB About Trump’s ‘Travel Ban’… YouTube CENSORS It
thread.title_full: Marine in Iraq Drops Truth BOMB About Trump’s ‘Travel Ban’… YouTube CENSORS It

author: Top Right News
title: Marine in Iraq Drops Truth BOMB About Trump’s ‘Travel Ban’… YouTube CENSORS It
text:
Email 
by Brooke Bosca | Top Right News 
The media and Democrats have lambasted President Donald Trump for his recent executive order on immigration, denouncing as “anti-Muslim” his restrictions on people from 7 high-risk nations entering the U.S. without a new system of “extreme vetting.” 
But a U.S. Marine veteran Steven Gern just posted a video to his Facebook page that blows those arguments out of the water. 
In the video, Gern stated that he currently works in Iraq and dropped a truth bomb about the harsh reality of that nation — one of those under Trump’s restrictions — which liberals are not going to like. 
Gern defends Trump’s “ban” by recalling conversations he had with Iraqis: 
“A lot of the Iraqis showed their displeasure in this executive order, and why they feel like they’ve been betrayed by the United States.” 
But after he listened to their complaints, he said he got a horrifying answer, “without hesitation,” to a simple question he had. He asked, “as an American, if I went out in town right now, would I be welcome?” They answered: 
“Absolutely not, you would not be welcome.” 
When asked, “What would happen if I went in town?” The Iraqis provided him a horrifying reality check: Locals would snatch him up Torture him Kill him within an hour – probably a beheading It would be filmed for everyone to see 
Gern highlighted that this isn’t ISIS or al-Qaeda making these claims; it’s the local populace. This led him to his final question: 
“If you would do this to me, in your country, why would I let you in my country?” 
His video’s purpose was to inform Americans about what’s taking place in one of the seven “banned countries” highlighted in President Trump’s executive order. 
By the next day, Gern’s video had garnered over 35 million views, according to the Daily Wire. 
Then the viral video was taken down by YouTube for violating “hate speech” rules . 
He has now reposted it (above), but it is unclear if the website’s liberal Google masters will censor it again. 
After all, his inconvenient truths are way too much reality for Trump-hating liberals to handle. YouTube and Google are CENSORING this Marine’s video…PLEASE SHARE it on Facebook and Twitter to spread the TRUTH…
